attributes.action: stop the manufacturers of convenience foods adding spices, pepper, etc to them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As someone who receives Disability Living Allowance because I am unable to prepare proper cooked meals I rely a lot on convenience foods.  Many of them, especially recently, seem to add spices and pepper to these foods; most of which would be very tasty if only they were not added! People's tastes differ and I feel, strongly, that nothing  extraneous at all should be added to these foods; anyone who wants pepper or spices on their food is perfectly capable of adding it for themselves!
